off to HK 2day. Long journey and traveling via Istanbul. Looking fwd to the Thai meal on arrival. YEAH BABY! (in an austin powers voice)
Looks like I am getting inked at midday 23rd December by Hong Kong's Hottest Tattoo Artist "Sze" . Video and blog will cover this event!
its hissing down with rain in pristina this morning. YUK! anyway tomorrow its flight time to HK. YEAH BABY YEAH! (in an austin powers voice)

having a continuing blast in hong kong but today is dedicated to project details and plans. the last day of the year. whats next?
up and at 'em today. establishing social media bits and bobs for rick. geekdays that i enjoy! still in hong kong. wooot!
off to bed but left data copying over to a new external HDD. See you tomorrow everyone.
